Convert an R2BB object to a BbXML package

to_bbxml_package.Rd

This function converts an R2BB object to a BbXML package, which can be used to import into Blackboard.

Usage

to_bbxml_package(
  x,
  output_path,
  convert_rich_text = "md_to_html_pandoc",
  convert_rich_text_options = list(deferred = TRUE),
  postprocess_xml = "md_to_html_pandoc_convert_deferred",
  postprocess_xml_options = list(options = "--mathml")
)

Arguments

x

An R2BB object to convert

output_path

The path to save the output BbXML package

convert_rich_text

Whether to convert rich text to HTML. By default, md_to_html_pandoc_mark_for_conversion is used, which converts Markdown to HTML using pandoc. Can be FALSE to prevent any

convert_rich_text_options

Additional arguments to pass to the convert_rich_text function

postprocess_xml

The function applied to the generated XML

postprocess_xml_options

Additional arguments for postprocess_xml conversion.

Value

The path to the output BbXML package
